Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr(?), a priest, with a blue painted lappet-wig, a modelled face with a blue painted beard and crossed arms in relief holding an adze in relief and the string of the incised seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs(very worn); there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Condition: fair - cracked at foot level, glaze worn
